Name: AUTOPILOT DISENGAGED
Description: Whether or not the autopilot has been disengaged.

Name: AUTOPILOT MANAGED SPEED IN MACH
Description: Is the Managed Speed in Mach

Name: AUTOPILOT MAX BANK
Description: True if autopilot max bank applied

Name: AUTOPILOT NAV1 LOCK
Description: True if autopilot nav1 lock applied

Name: AUTOPILOT PITCH HOLD
Description: Set to True if the autopilot pitch hold has is engaged.

Name: AUTOPILOT RPM HOLD
Description: True if autopilot rpm hold applied

Name: AUTOPILOT TAKEOFF POWER ACTIVE
Description: Takeoff / Go Around power mode active

Name: AUTOPILOT VERTICAL HOLD
Description: True if autopilot vertical hold applied

Name: FLY BY WIRE ELAC FAILED
Description: True if the Elevators and Ailerons computer has failed.

Name: FLY BY WIRE ELAC SWITCH
Description: True if the fly by wire Elevators and Ailerons computer is on.

Name: FLY BY WIRE FAC FAILED
Description: True if the Flight Augmentation computer has failed.

Name: FLY BY WIRE FAC SWITCH
Description: True if the fly by wire Flight Augmentation computer is on.

Name: FLY BY WIRE SEC FAILED
Description: True if the Spoilers and Elevators computer has failed.

Name: FLY BY WIRE SEC SWITCH
Description: True if the fly by wire Spoilers and Elevators computer is on.
